amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 505, which prohibits funds from being used for further implementation of the coastal and marine spatial planning and ecosystem-based management components of the National Ocean Policy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to strike Sec.505, which prohibits funds from being used for further implementation of the coastal and marine spatial planning and ecosystem-based management components of the National Ocean Policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 223 (Roll no. 250).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 223 (Roll no. 250).
